com.jingtum.net

类 APIResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jingtum.model.JingtumObject
      • com.jingtum.net.APIResource
  • 直接已知子类:
    Utility, Wallet

    public abstract class APIResource
extends JingtumObject
    Extends the abstract class when you need request anything from jingtum
